page.title: 20LEISURE TIME (2) + CREDITS
page.content: Two children had unusual pastimes. One girl is a member of the Jehova's Witnesses, and spends Saturdays going from door to door preaching, while another girl is a member of an amateur theatrical group the "Haymarketeers". All pupils thought there was a lack of amenities for youngsters in the area. ************************************** {CREDITS} There are far too many people to mention, but thanks especially to:- {Mrs.M.McEwan, Mr.P.Busby, Mr.K.Clarke, {Mr.J.Kerry, Mr.P.Bugess, Mr.E.Bates, {Mr.A.Saley, Miss A.Vickery and all the {staff and children of Folville Junior, {King Richard III, Marriott Primary & {Newry Junior Schools. { Special thanks also to Mr.W.Woods {the Area Co-ordinator. { F.W.Walthoe (Editor, Collator { and Typist) }
